item.title: Who is this guy?
item.description: I am Shaswat Gupta, a Senior Site Reliability Engineer at media.net. 2013-2017: B.Tech in Information Technology at NIT Durgapur. 2017-present: SRE profile at media.net. Major Research Contributions Author Profile on IEEE. A semantic web and linked data based framework for Smart City data management S. Gupta, A. Padhy, A. Adhikari and A. Dutta, "A semantic web and linked data based framework for Smart City data management," 2016 13th International Conference on Electrical Engineering/Electronics, Computer, Telecommunications and Information Technology (ECTI-CON), 2016, pp.

item.title: License
item.description: I want people to be able to use anything if they want to with attribution and without warranty. I think these licenses are appropriate. Please let me know if there are better licenses that achieve this goal. Content License Except where otherwise noted, my non-code content on this website is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC 4.0(Creative Commons Attribution-Non Commercial 4.0). Code License Except where otherwise noted, my code on this website is licensed under MIT:
